attributes.action: Stop charging migrants to use the NHS. Remove the Immigration Health Surcharge.
attributes.additional_details: We are a group of 60 migrants, mostly on the 10 year route to settlement. Every 30 months we renew our visas, for one adult this costs £1258 per visa. Every year we pay the IHS to access the NHS. This costs £1035 per adult, and £776 per child. Our families are living in poverty and are at risk. These costs have made life in the UK unbearable and not everyone is eligible for a fee waiver. We ask the government to equalise access to the NHS, and to treat everyone in the UK with dignity.
attributes.background:
Stop charging migrants to use the NHS, and remove the Immigration Health Surcharge. Until such time as that can be achieved:

Remove the IHS for people that are working. Remove the IHS for people after their first application for leave to remain. Reduce the 10 year route to settlement to 5 years.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714377
